Jean-Frederic Clere
This is the Changelog for Apache Tomcat Native 2.0.x. The Tomcat Native 2.0.x branch started from the 1.2.33 tag.
Update the minimum required version of OpenSSL to 3.0.0 and make it a madatory dependency. (markt)
Update the minimum required version of APR to 1.7.0. (markt)
Remove NPN support as NPN was never standardised and browser support was removed in 2019. (markt)
Add support for using OpenSSL when the FIPS provider is configured as the default provider. (markt)
Remove all API methods (and supporting code) that are not used by Tomcat 10.1.x to support the use of OpenSSL as a replacement for JSSE to provide TLS functionality. (markt)
Please see the 1.2.x changelog.
Please see the 1.1.x changelog.
